text.text_translated:
Packaging is the paper or plastic around food.
For the last ten years, many people were unhappy with the big supermarkets. They threw away a lot of food. They did not pay enough money to their suppliers. They also used too much plastic for their packaging. This was bad for our world.

But now, supermarkets are starting to listen. Customers were very angry about the plastic rubbish. Because of this, some of the biggest supermarkets in the UK agreed to a plan to make changes. They will change their packaging. And they will use less plastic.
